text: Is there a plot recipe for Flux.Chain? I started to write one, that already works for Dense and RNN layers (the easy ones), but I would like to know whether there's one already or not.

elements.text: Is there a plot recipe for Flux.Chain? I started to write one, that already works for Dense and RNN layers (the easy ones), but I would like to know whether there's one already or not.

text: No, but we’d appreciate the PR! <https://github.com/FluxML/Flux.jl/issues/1104>
